title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-contained LLM runner with a REST API and CLI for macOS, Linux, and Windows.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama HTTP API; works in Node and browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull models with a few lines.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package exposing Ollama models as standard LangChain LLMs & embedders.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, PDF, RAG, dark mode, admin panel).

title: ollama-chat
summary: Minimal open-source chat UI that talks to a local Ollama instance.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Lightweight RAG pipeline combining Ollama embeddings and llama.cpp for retrieval QA.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community Rust CLI that wraps the Ollama REST API with fzf model picker and chat history.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a local GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-nvim
summary: Neovim plugin to generate, refactor, or chat with code using Ollama models.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official multi-arch Docker images for Ollama with CUDA & ROCm variants.

title: ollama-models
summary: Curated collection of community Modelfiles for CodeLlama, Vicuna, Zephyr, SQLCoder, etc.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Async Rust crate for the Ollama HTTP API with serde types and streaming support.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client library for Ollama; generate, chat, pull, and list models idiomatically.

title: ollama-fastapi
summary: FastAPI micro-service that exposes OpenAI-compatible endpoints backed by Ollama.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot that lets a workspace chat with any local Ollama model via slash commands.

title: ollama-dify
summary: Dify.ai integration so you can add Ollama models to their no-code LLM orchestration studio.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.x integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaChatGenerator nodes.

title: ollama-pypi
summary: Official PyPI package for ollama-python; install with pip and talk to your local models.
